messages.subject: HI EVERYONE
messages.msgSnippet: I m an italian boy that loves samurai s history. I read manga. One of these, a Tetsuo Hara s one,is kalled Hana no Keiji. It tells the history of Keijiro
messages.messageBody:
I'm an italian boy that loves samurai's history.
I read manga.
One of these, a Tetsuo Hara's one,is kalled Hana no Keiji.
It tells the history of Keijiro Maeda, hipotetical nephow of Daimyo
Toshie Maeda.
I'm searching from a lot of time for knowing if is he a fantasy
character or did he lived...

If someone can halp me, please DO IT! I can't sleep!!!



Sorry for BAD english...





Mukuan
